name: 1c5814fa-da3e-4cc8-b0cf-96694c5d841d
goal: Identify the orders that the user needs to order depending on the meals that they wish to make and what ingredients they already have at home

steps.text: Collect the $ingredients that the user may already have and use ${TOOL: Recipe Search} to build a list of ingredients neededS.
confirm with the user that they are happy to place the order and send this to a the supermarket
add this to an existing shopping list if one exists
